summary.span: 提供一个基类，用于从 对象中请求操作的安全状态。

span.span: Provides a base class for requesting the security status of an action from the object.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，确保由 表示的状态在宿主上可用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, ensures that the state that is represented by is available on the host.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 类的此实现的状态是否在当前宿主上可用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the state for this implementation of the class is available on the current host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法来确定此类表示的状态在主机上是否可用。 calls the method to determine whether the state that is represented by this class is available on the host. 有关 方法的示例实现，请参阅 类。See the class for an example implementation of the method.
